update sms_passage_access
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
route_type = #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update sms_passage_access set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, route_type = #{routeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_code = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passage_id = #{passageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, passage_code = #{passageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, protocol = #{protocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_type = #{callType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params_definition = #{paramsDefinition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_format = #{resultFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_code = #{successCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_size = #{mobileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, packets_size = #{packetsSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, connection_size = #{connectionSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, read_timeout = #{readTimeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ext_number = #{extNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, access_code = #{accessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_mode = #{signMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sms_template_param = #{smsTemplateParam,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select passage_id, protocol, call_type, url, params,success_code from sms_passage_access where call_type = #{callType} and status = 0 group by passage_id, protocol, call_type, url, params,success_code

select
from sms_passage_access where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and cmcp = #{cmcp,jdbcType=INTEGER} and route_type = 0 order by id desc limit 1

select passage_id, protocol, call_type, url, params_definition,params, result_format, success_code, position, mobile_size, packets_size, access_code, ext_number from sms_passage_access where url = #{url} and call_type = #{callType} limit 1
mapper.delete: update sms_passage_access set status = #{status} where passage_id = ${passageId}
